error.title: Workspace directory not collected
error.description:
## Workspace directory not collected
To use external version control, you must provide local workspace dir on your machine.
error.detail:
### __Detailed Info__ (optional)
Externally version controlled files must be first copied locally to workspace area before they are committed to the version control server (like Perforce).
### How to repair?
Connect to Ayon server and set your local workspace folder in `ayon+settings://version_control:0.0.1/local_setting/workspace_dir`
